TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Ta´man, title = Ta´man, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ta´man} }

S.FORM: == Pangangan 膽曼名稱由來 == Ta´man a niyaro', Tahapinangan 特色 Tamdaw 人口 Itiniay i Changbin Cen no Taitung ko Ta´man a niyaro', 101 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 279 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 90% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 252 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 10% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 27 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis88%, roma3%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. Pitooran 信仰 O finacadan no Yincomi 所屬阿美族群

== Pangangan 膽曼名稱由來 == Ta´man a niyaro', Tahapinangan 特色 Tamdaw 人口 Itiniay i Changbin Cen no Taitong ko Ta´man a niyaro', 101 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 279 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 90% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 252 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 10% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 27 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis88%, roma3%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. Pitooran 信仰 O finacadan no Yincomi 所屬阿美族群
